channel.title: Hmm..help plox <3
channel.description:
Well, i'm really new to this. I've been working on this source for a while, I can't figure out how to give myself admin...-.-
Before, i would just open the login.java and give myself prights 2, but its a login.class and i can't edit that?
Anyideas? Also that goes with editing the login information. I can't find it in this source, whereas it was in the client.java on my last one.
Another problem i'm having is, I port forwarded my router, but only TWO people can log into my server? How do I fix that? Thanks much appreciated.
- Zephyr

item.title: Hmm..help plox <3
item.dc:creator: @Vice117 Vice117
item.description:
@Vice117 wrote:

Dude, if nothing else works, go into client.java and search for this:

start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin

If you find it, you should see something like this under it:

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“NAME”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

You don’t need to create a new one, just change the part where it says NAME. It will have someone elses player name there, just change it to yours.

If that doesn’t work then I don’t know…

Hope I helped.

Read full topic

I’ve tried, I have the admin crown. but idk why none of the commands work. I can’t open the files on the names. Its Runedirty 508 or w/e

item.title: Hmm..help plox <3
item.dc:creator: @Ill_Pk_You Ill Pk You
item.description:
@Ill_Pk_You wrote:

Well, to give your self staff rights, theres usually a folder called “Characters” or “Players” on many sources. Look for one of them and the files should be in there. Also, what source are you using?

Read full topic
